content: japanese name こいのぼりタワシ pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols **materials ** * japanese size 7 5/0 crochet hook 4 5mm * 24m color a * 18m color b * 1 button 11 5mm diameter no gauge is given in the pattern this tawashi dish scrubbie is modeled after the traditional *koinobori* こいのぼり carp streamers that are flown in japan on children s day may 5
